content: knitted top in drops cotton light or drops cotton merino piece is knitted bottom up with cables pattern cluster-134 yarn group b **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops cotton light from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 350-400-450-500-500-550 g colour 21 light beige or use drops cotton merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 350-400-400-450-500-550 g colour no 03 beige **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 80 cm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 and 80 cm drops cable needle the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm 10 stitches in width with cable pattern/a 1= 3 8 cm
